Class RabbitNotificationServiceConfig

java.lang.Object
ru.tpu.hostel.internal.config.amqp.RabbitNotificationServiceConfig
@Configuration @EnableConfigurationProperties({RabbitNotificationServiceProperties.class,RabbitNotificationQueueingPropertiesSend.class}) public class RabbitNotificationServiceConfig extends Object
